page.title: 09The Development of Old Hall
page.content: A year later in 1982 there were a thousand peolple living in Old Hall.In February 82 the new school of Old Hall County Primary was opened with 40 children and 4 teachers. In May 1982 the children of the school opened the nearby new road and were treated to a party by the New Town Development Corporation.Today in 1985 there are 3,500 people living in Old Hall.The camps have gone and so have most of the fields,now there are roads,houses,cars,and people everywhere. The tree is still there watching the farmhouse turn into a pub,the Old Hall renovated,more houses built,and more and more people moving in. The Old Chestnut tree is probably wondering if the people will stay this time.The signs are that they probably will.
